select a.id as id,a.sch_name as schoolName,a.sch_address as schAddress, getRegionStr(a.sch_area) as schArea,b.label as 'schoolType',c.label as 'officeNature ' from se_school a left join ( select * from sys_dict where del_flag='0' and type='school_type' ) b on b.value = a.sch_city left join ( select * from sys_dict where del_flag='0' and type='office_nature' ) c on c.value = a.office_nature 1=1 and a.del_flag = '0'
and a.id=#{map.schoolId}

SELECT ss.sch_name , b.reg_name, c.edu_name, ss.sch_address AS address, ss.sch_principal AS principal, ss.sch_area AS area, ss.sch_tel AS tel, ss.rating_score AS ratingScore, CASE
WHEN ss.quantitative IN ( 1 ) THEN 'A' WHEN ss.quantitative IN ( 2 ) THEN 'B' WHEN ss.quantitative = '3' THEN 'C' WHEN ss.quantitative = '4' THEN 'D' ELSE '' END AS quantitative FROM se_school ss left join se_regulator b on b.reg_area=ss.sch_area left join se_education c on c.edu_area=ss.sch_area
ss.id=#{map.schoolId}
and ss.del_flag='0'

select count(smf.id) as LicenseTotal
from sup_main_filing smf where
smf.school_id=#{map.schoolId}
and smf.del_flag='0' and smf.permit_end > now() and smf.permit_start < now()

select count(smf.id) as OpenTotal
from sup_main_filing smf where
smf.school_id=#{map.schoolId}
and smf.del_flag='0' and smf.bulicense_end > now() and smf.bulicense_start < now()

SELECT ifnull(a.user_id,0)as userId, ifnull(a.real_name,'无') AS realName, ifnull(b.label,'无')AS label, ifnull(a.health_number,0) as healthNumber FROM sys_user a LEFT JOIN ( SELECT * FROM sys_dict WHERE del_flag = '0' AND type = 'position' ) b ON b.VALUE = a.position
1=1 AND a.del_flag = '0' AND a.user_type = '2'
and a.union_id = #{map.schoolId}
and a.position = '1'

SELECT count(a.user_id) number, b.label AS label FROM sys_user a LEFT JOIN ( SELECT * FROM sys_dict WHERE del_flag = '0' AND type = 'position' ) b ON b. VALUE = a.position
a.del_flag = '0' AND a.user_type = '2'
and a.union_id = #{map.schoolId}
GROUP BY a.position

select count(a.user_id) healthCard from sys_user a
a.lock_flag='0' and a.del_flag ='0' and a.user_type='2'
and a.union_id=#{map.schoolId}
and a.health_endtime >NOW() and a.health_starttime < NOW()

SELECT CASE
WHEN alarm IN ( 1 ) THEN '营业执照' WHEN alarm IN ( 2 ) THEN '许可证' WHEN alarm IN ( '3', '4' ) THEN a.human WHEN alarm IN ( '5', '6', '7' ) THEN a.food_name ELSE '' END AS tital, CASE
WHEN alarm IN ( '1', '2' ) THEN '证照报警' WHEN alarm IN ( '3', '4' ) THEN '人员报警' WHEN alarm IN ( '5', '6', '7' ) THEN '食材报警' ELSE '' END AS type, c.label AS label, a.alarm_time AS time, a.supplier_name AS supplier, b.sch_name AS schoolName, b.id AS schoolId
from ck_early_alarm a LEFT JOIN ( SELECT a.* FROM se_school a WHERE 1 = 1 AND a.del_flag = '0' ) b ON b.id = a.school_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT * FROM sys_dict a WHERE 1 = 1 AND a.del_flag = '0' AND a.type = 'alarm' ORDER BY a.sort ) c ON c. VALUE = a.alarm
1=1 and a.del_flag = '0'
and DATE_FORMAT(a.early_time,'%Y') = #{map.year}
AND b.id = #{map.schoolId}
